title: MCP-AI: Protocol-Driven Intelligence Framework for Autonomous Reasoning in Healthcare
summary: Healthcare AI systems have historically faced challenges in merging contextual reasoning, long-term state management, and human-verifiable workflows into a cohesive framework. This paper introduces a completely innovative architecture and concept: combining the Model Context Protocol (MCP) with a specific clinical application, known as MCP-AI.
